content:
I'm new to Lean and I'm trying to install and get running the mathematics_in_lean book's project. I have gone through most of the Lean 4 Setup in VS code, but once I get to creating a project which depends on Mathlib I end up getting the following error in the output:

info: downloading component 'lean'
error: could not create temp file: /Users/petermao/.elan/tmp/pr1j_ju1113rxt8k_file
=> Operation failed. Exit code: 1.

This happens both when I try the 'create a new project using Mathlib' option and when I try downloading an existing project (mathematics_in_lean). It does not however happen for creating a standalone project. That seems to work just fine.

I'm on a Mac M4 chip running MacOS 15.1. Any help would be appreciated.
What are the permissions on your .elan directory? Can you write files there manually?

After some googling, I figured out how to change the permissions of the directory and things started working! Here's what worked:
chmod -R 775 .elan/
Thanks!
Peter Mao has marked this topic as resolved.
